name: Dot NET Core
label: .Net Core
description: Build and test a .NET or ASP.NET Core project
pipelineYaml:
pipeline:
  name: Build .NET Core App
  identifier: Build_reactcalculator_1663793074386
  projectIdentifier: Default_Project_1663793031057
  orgIdentifier: default
  properties:
    ci:
      codebase:
        connectorRef: GitHub
        repoName: PowerShell/PowerShell
        build: <+input>
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Build Dot NET Core App
        identifier: Build_NET_Core_App
        description: ""
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: true
          platform:
            os: Linux
            arch: Amd64
          runtime:
            type: Cloud
            spec: {}
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: Build Dot NET Core App
                  identifier: Build_NET_Core_App
                  spec:
                    connectorRef: account.harnessImage
                    image: mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:6.0
                    shell: Sh
                    command: |-
                      echo "Welcome to Harness CI"
                      dotnet restore
                      dotnet build --no-restore
                      dotnet test --no-build --verbosity normal

name: Java with Maven
description: Build and test a Java project with Apache Maven
pipelineYaml:
pipeline:
  name: Build Java App with Maven
  identifier: Build_reactcalculator_1663793074386
  projectIdentifier: Default_Project_1663793031057
  orgIdentifier: default
  properties:
    ci:
      codebase:
        connectorRef: account.Github_OAuth_1663793054861
        repoName: rustd/reactcalculator
        build: <+input>
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Build Java App with Maven
        identifier: Build_Java_App_with_Maven
        description: ""
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: true
          platform:
            os: Linux
            arch: Amd64
          runtime:
            type: Cloud
            spec: {}
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: Build Java App
                  identifier: Build_Java_App
                  spec:
                    shell: Sh
                    command: |-
                      echo "Welcome to Harness CI"
                      mvn -B package --file pom.xml

name: Go
description: Build and test a Go project
pipelineYaml:
pipeline:
  name: Build Go App
  identifier: Build_reactcalculator_1663793074386
  projectIdentifier: Default_Project_1663793031057
  orgIdentifier: default
  properties:
    ci:
      codebase:
        connectorRef: account.Github_OAuth_1663793054861
        repoName: rustd/reactcalculator
        build: <+input>
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Build Go App
        identifier: Build
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: true
          platform:
            os: Linux
            arch: Amd64
          runtime:
            type: Cloud
            spec: {}
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: Build Go App
                  identifier: Run
                  spec:
                    connectorRef: account.harnessImage
                    image: golang
                    shell: Sh
                    command: |-
                      echo "Welcome to Harness CI"
                      go build                              
                      go test

name: NodeJS
label: Node.js
description: Build and test a Node.js project with npm
pipelineYaml:
pipeline:
  name: Build Node App
  identifier: Build_reactcalculator_1663793074386
  projectIdentifier: Default_Project_1663793031057
  orgIdentifier: default
  properties:
    ci:
      codebase:
        connectorRef: account.Github_OAuth_1663793054861
        repoName: rustd/reactcalculator
        build: <+input>
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Build Node App
        identifier: Build_Node_App
        description: ""
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: true
          platform:
            os: Linux
            arch: Amd64
          runtime:
            type: Cloud
            spec: {}
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: Build Node App
                  identifier: Build_Node_App
                  spec:
                    connectorRef: account.harnessImage
                    image: node
                    shell: Sh
                    command: |-
                      echo "Welcome to Harness CI"
                      npm install
                      npm run build --if-present
                      npm test

name: Python
description: Build and test a Python project
pipelineYaml:
pipeline:
  name:  Build Python App
  identifier: Build_reactcalculator_1663793074386
  projectIdentifier: Default_Project_1663793031057
  orgIdentifier: default
  properties:
    ci:
      codebase:
        connectorRef: account.Github_OAuth_1663793054861
        repoName: rustd/reactcalculator
        build: <+input>
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: Build Python App
        identifier: Build_Python_App
        description: ""
        type: CI
        spec:
          cloneCodebase: true
          platform:
            os: Linux
            arch: Amd64
          runtime:
            type: Cloud
            spec: {}
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: Run
                  name: Build Python App
                  identifier: Build_Python_App
                  spec:
                    shell: Sh
                    command: |-
                      echo "Welcome to Harness CI"
                      pip install -r requirements.txt
                      pytest
